quote: To be or not to be, that is the question.
If you want to create peace, you have to work for justice.
Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
Dreams are not what you see in sleep, but the thing that does not let you sleep.
Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another, 'What! You too? I thought I was the only one.
Where the mind is without fear and the head is held high...
Vasantasya smritir eva kusumam bahu phalā
Arise, awake, and stop not till the goal is reached.
It was the best of times, it was the worst of times, it was the age of wisdom, it was the age of foolishness...
It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife.
Those who can see do not speak; those who speak cannot see.
It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be.
May the wind under your wings bear you where you would go.
So we beat on, boats against the current, borne back ceaselessly into the past.
You never really understand a person until you consider things from his point of view... Until you climb into his skin and walk around in it.
War is peace. Freedom is slavery. Ignorance is strength.
Until the lions learn to write, every story will glorify the hunter.
